name: wpilib-utilities
description: A minimal Electron application written with Typescript

scripts.copyshared2: copyfiles -a -u 4 "../../gradleBase/java/**/*" resources/src/java/gradlebase && copyfiles -a -u 4 "../../gradleBase/cpp/**/*" resources/src/cpp/gradlebase && copyfiles -a -u 6 "../../wpilibcExamples/src/main/cpp/**/*" resources/src/cpp && copyfiles -a -u 10 "../../wpilibjExamples/src/main/java/edu/wpi/first/wpilibj/**/*" resources/src/java && copyfiles -a -f ../shared/generatorAPIs/**.* src/shared
scripts.compile: npm run copyshared && npm run copyshared2 && tsc
scripts.clean: rmdir-cli resources/src && rmdir-cli src/shared && rmdir-cli src/riolog/shared && rmdir-cli out

author: GitHub
